content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_button
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 15, "index": 13}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 38, "index": 18}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 43, "index": 22}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 40, "index": 30}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 60, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft an oak_button, I need to craft oak_planks first. To craft oak_planks, I need to move a stripped_oak_wood to slot 1.
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_button
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 15, "index": 13}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 38, "index": 18}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 43, "index": 22}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 40, "index": 30}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 60, "index": 45}]
thought: I have crafted the oak_planks, now I need to move it to a free slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_button
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 15, "index": 13}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 38, "index": 18}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 43, "index": 22}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 40, "index": 30}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 60, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have the oak_planks, I need to move it to slot 1 to craft the oak_button.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_button
inventory=[{"type": "oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 15, "index": 13}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 38, "index": 18}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 43, "index": 22}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 40, "index": 30}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 60, "index": 45}]

act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
